articles.description: Follow live text commentary from Oakmont as all the action unfolds from day 4 in the US Open.
articles.title: US Open Oakmont LIVE: Follow Day 4 action through radio commentary & live text

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from PSG vs Atlético Madrid in the FIFA Club World Cup
articles.title: FIFA Club World Cup LIVE: PSG vs Atlético Madrid - text, score updates, stats & head-to-head

articles.description: Lando Norris crashes out of the Canadian Grand Prix in a collision with McLaren team-mate Oscar Piastri, as George Russell wins.
articles.title: Canadian Grand Prix result: Lando Norris and Oscar Piastri collide as George Russell wins

articles.description: Bayern Munich's Club World Cup group game against Auckland City was a mismatch on the pitch - so why were the part-timers from New Zealand facing the 34-time German champions?
articles.title: Club World Cup 2025: A mismatch – why were Auckland City playing Bayern Munich?

articles.description: Armand Duplantis breaks the men's pole vault record for a 12th time - but for the first time in Sweden - at the Stockholm Diamond League.
articles.title: Armand Duplantis pole vault world record: Swedish star dazzles at Stockholm Diamond League

articles.description: Former Formula 1 driver Robert Kubica take victory at the Le Mans 24 Hours with a privately entered Ferrari.
articles.title: Le Mans: Robert Kubica, 40, wins iconic race in privately entered Ferrari

articles.description: Slovenia's Tadej Pogacar secures his first Criterium du Dauphine title after finishing third in Sunday's final stage.
articles.title: Criterium du Dauphine: Tadej Pogacar retains lead to win maiden title

articles.description: Carlota Ciganda finishes one stroke clear of Choi Hye-jin for her first LPGA Tour victory in nine years at the Meijer Classic in Michigan.
articles.title: Carlota Ciganda ends LPGA Tour victory drought at Meijer Classic in Michigan

articles.description: Italy appoint their 2006 World Cup-winning midfielder Gennaro Gattuso as their manager, replacing Luciano Spalletti.
articles.title: Italy appoint former midfielder Gennaro Gattuso as manager before 2026 World Cup

articles.description: Tatjana Maria completes an incredible run from qualifying to the title as she beats Amanda Anisimova to become the first women's Queen's champion for 52 years.
articles.title: Queen's final: Tatjana Maria stuns Amanda Anisimova to become event's first women's champion for 52 years
